newsitem.title: UK: UK's FTSE ends with modest gains after Dow rally.
newsitem.headline: UK's FTSE ends with modest gains after Dow rally.

text.p: The UK's FTSE 100 share index ended higher on Wednesday but towards the lowest levels of the day, after a dramatic climb on the back of Wall Street's latest record petered out towards the close.
The leading index had climbed as high as 4,931.5 in early trade to notch up an 85 point gain. But by the close the FTSE stood a modest 27.8 points higher at 4,874.5.

"Market makers were too quick to hike up prices this morning...the volume didn't justify an 80 point gain," one dealer commented. "We had a very good rally on the back of Wall Street but what is more interesting is that it didn't last."
